name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
eligibility: Farmers with less than 2 hectares of land

name: Ayushman Bharat
description: Free healthcare insurance up to ₹5 lakh.

name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
eligibility: Farmers with less than 2 hectares of land

name: Ayushman Bharat
description: Free healthcare insurance up to ₹5 lakh.

name: Stand Up India Scheme
description: Provides bank loans between ₹10 lakh to ₹1 crore for women entrepreneurs in manufacturing, trading, or services.

name: Pradhan Mantri MUDRA Yojana (PMMY)
description: Offers collateral-free micro-credit up to ₹10 lakh to small and micro enterprises under Shishu, Kishor, and Tarun categories.

name: Deendayal Antyodaya Yojana - NRLM
description: Supports rural women through SHGs with training, microcredit, and livelihood development.

name: Udyogini Scheme
description: Provides interest-free loans up to ₹3 lakh to women entrepreneurs from rural and economically weaker backgrounds.

name: Integrated Dairy Development Scheme (IDDS)
description: Offers financial and technical support to start and sustain dairy farming businesses in rural areas.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers, rural women

name: Mahila Coir Yojana
description: Supports rural women in coir-based industry with a 75% subsidy on machinery and training.
eligibility: Women in rural areas, preferably trained in coir processing

name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY)
description: Enables zero-balance savings accounts for financial inclusion and direct benefit transfers.
eligibility: All Indian citizens without a bank account

name: Mahila Samman Savings Certificate
description: Provides 7.5% fixed interest for 2 years, available for investments up to ₹2 lakh by women.

name: Rural Skill Development - DDU-GKY
description: Skill training and placement programs for rural youth including women in various trades.
eligibility: Rural women aged 15–35 from poor households

name: Atal Pension Yojana (APY)
description: Pension scheme for informal sector workers ensuring income after retirement.
eligibility: Unorganized sector workers aged 18–40 with a savings account
